name: Deep Dive (Cadbury)
description:
Thank you for taking a look at my first game!

  • This little short pixel platformer was part of a 2-week jam.
  • Keep out for little secrets like my fish Todd and the keys to reach the ending that is the beginning to a whole new story I have been working on for a while. 
  • Any feedback is welcome and please enjoy :)

I hope you really enjoy it!
